event.title: Oracle Apps DBA Training in Chennai
event.description: Oracle DBA is a structured collection of information that can be retrieved, updated and analyzed efficiently. Oracle DBA is invented to overcome the possible limitations faced by excel, notepad or simple VB code. This is nowadays widely used in many industries. Learn from our experts in FITA Academy to get training and certification in Oracle DBA. Weekend and weekday classes are available. We have a placement service too. Enroll today at Oracle DBA Training in Chennai and contact us at 98404-11333 for further inquiries.
event.address: 37F Velachery Main Road, Velachery,  Chennai - 600042 Tamil Nadu
